## 題目名稱

ez_RSA

## 題目類型

Crypto

## 題目說明

Do you know how to use RSA correctly?

## WriteUp


```python
from gmpy2 import *
from Crypto.Random import *
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from egcd import egcd


#=====================================flag1
n = 266390013019452180606454446621936087871
e = 65537
c = 155813651375107551102251418069171209947
p=15637387821762446863
q=17035454773892542417
phi=(p-1)*(q-1)
d=invert(e,phi)
n=p*q
flag1=long_to_bytes(powmod(c,d,n))
print(flag1)

#=====================================flag2
n = 
e = 65537
c = 
p=next_prime(iroot(n,2)[0])
q=n//p
phi=(p-1)*(q-1)
d=invert(e,phi)
n=p*q
flag2=long_to_bytes(powmod(c,d,n))
print(flag2)



#=====================================flag3
n = 
e1 = 65537
e2 = 12345
c1 = 
c2 = 
x0,x1,x2=gcdext(e1,e2)
m=powmod(c1,x1,n)*powmod(c2,x2,n)
m=m%n
flag3=long_to_bytes(m)
print(flag3)

print("==========================")
flag=flag1+flag2+flag3
print(flag)

```

 ## flag

MOCSCTF{RSA_d0_NOt_sAf3_aT_a11_if_You_Us3_wroNg}
